name: Magic Leap
description: Magic Leap is a US startup company that is working on a head-mounted virtual retinal display which superimposes 3D computer-generated imagery over real world objects, by projecting a digital light field into the user's eye.

funding.investors: Google Ventures, Vulcan Capital, Qualcomm Ventures, Andreessen Horowitz, KKR, Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers
Fidelity Investments, Warner Bros., Alibaba, JP Morgan Chase & Co
